name: 19th Century Government Simulator
description:
A game made for the Godot Wild Jam #53 (Assembly Required)

Click on the buttons to progress through the story, and for the fighting:

1. Move with A/D or Left/Right arrow keys.

2. Change stance with W/S or Up/Down arrow keys.

3. Lunge with [Spacebar].

Sound Effects from: "Groovy's Retro Sound Effects"

Music: By a friend (no link).

Color Palette from: https://pixelcod.itch.io/ghost
